thread.title: UK inflation sticks near six-year high

title: UK inflation sticks near six-year high
text:
UK inflation sticks near six-year high 9:00am EST - 01:36 
British inflation unexpectedly held close to its highest level in nearly six years in January, highlighting the challenge the Bank of England will face as it tries to return price growth to target over the next two years. Sonia Legg reports
